      • hasData

        public boolean hasData()
        Description copied from interface: InputPort
        Method which tests whether data (including EOF flag) is awaiting/ready to be read. Following read operation should not block, nonetheless can return null as EOF flag.
        Specified by:
        hasData in interface InputPort
        Returns:
        True if read operation won't block due to lack of data

      • readRecordDirect

        public boolean readRecordDirect(CloverBuffer record)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: InputPortDirect
        An operation that reads one record from this port - in its serialized (binary form).
        The passed-in object (content) is cleared first (using CloverBuffer.clear()). When data is stored in it, CloverBuffer.flip() operation is called upon it - it is ready to be read when method call ends.
        Specified by:
        readRecordDirect in interface InputPortDirect
        Parameters:
        record - CloverBuffer into which data should be stored
        Returns:
        True if success, otherwise false (when no more data available)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading failed during method call
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If thread waiting to be notified was interrupted

      • readRecordDirect

        @Deprecated
public boolean readRecordDirect(java.nio.ByteBuffer record)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: InputPortDirect
        An operation that reads one record from this port - in its serialized (binary form).
        The passed-in object (content) is cleared first (using ByteBuffer.clear()). When data is stored in it, ByteBuffer.flip() operation is called upon it - it is ready to be read when method call ends.
        Specified by:
        readRecordDirect in interface InputPortDirect
        Parameters:
        record - ByteBuffer into which data should be stored
        Returns:
        True if success, otherwise false (when no more data available)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading failed during method call
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If thread waiting to be notified was interrupted

        Description copied from interface: InputPort
        Available only in graph verbose mode.
        Specified by:
        getReaderWaitingTime in interface InputPort
        Returns:
        aggregated time how long the reader thread waits for data
